body:
I don't have an arm machine handy. Arm64 can run arm binaries, though, provided you have a kernel with 4k pages.

I use a 64k kernel on my arm64 because I want to make sure Go works with 64k pages. I can revert it to a 4k kernel for this, but this week and the next one I am very very busy, so if someone else can do it it would be great.
